body.p:
Journal Office
Louisville June 10. 1863
Gov Robinson
Dear Sir

Our Board of Trade have adopted a new By Law requiring all members to take an oath of allegiance. As the Secty of the Board it is desirable that I should be empowered to administer the oath for which purpose if consistent with your view, I shall be pleased to receive an appointment as Notary Public

Most cordially yours
James L. Wallace

Jefferson Co
Notary
Jas S. Wallace
Appt June 11. 1863.
